title: Chain-of-Draft Prompting: A More Efficient Alternative to Chain of Thought
title1: Chain-of-Draft Prompting: A More Efficient Alternative to Chain of Thought
title2: Chain-of-Draft Prompting: A More Efficient Alternative to Chain of Thought
description: Learn about the new Chain-of-Draft (CoD) prompting technique, its usefulness, tips and how to use it. See how it compares to CoT and discover how to implement it to improve your AI application's performance and reduce costs.
author: Yusuf
